name: The Deep Below (MisticCoke)
description:
This game was made by UEL Games - CashMoney2077 for the Ukie 2018/2019 Game Jam.

Theme of game jam: Change

How was it implemented in this game:
- You change your character and weapon when you take a hit! 

Type of game: Hard bullet hell with random generation.

My contribution: Game design, environment art, animation, weapons and characters art.
